  • Classes in io.ddf used by io.basic.ddf 
    Class and Description
    DDF
    A Distributed DataFrame (DDF) has a number of key properties (metadata, representations, etc.) and capabilities (self-compute basic statistics, aggregations, etc.).
    DDFManager
    Abstract base class for a DDF implementor, which provides the support methods necessary to implement various DDF interfaces, such as IHandleRepresentations and ISupportML.
    IDDFManager

    Vector
    A one-dimensional array of values of the same type, e.g., Integer or Double or String.
